005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
012
013public interface IBooleanItem extends IAnyAtomicItem {
014  @NonNull
015  IBooleanItem TRUE = new BooleanItemImpl(true);
016  @NonNull
017  IBooleanItem FALSE = new BooleanItemImpl(false);
018
019  /**
020   * Construct a new boolean item using the provided string {@code value}.
021   * <p>
022   * The item will be {@link #TRUE} if the value is "1" or "true", or
023   * {@link #FALSE} otherwise
024   *
025   * @param value
026   *          a string representing a boolean value
027   * @return the new item
028   */
029  @NonNull
030  static IBooleanItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
031    IBooleanItem retval;
032    if ("1".equals(value)) {
033      retval = TRUE;
034    } else {
035      try {
036        Boolean bool = MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.BOOLEAN.parse(value);
037        retval = valueOf(bool);
038      } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
039        throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(String.format("Unable to parse string value '%s'", value),
040            ex);
041      }
042    }
043    return retval;
044  }
045
046  /**
047   * Construct a new boolean item using the provided {@code value}.
048   *
049   * @param value
050   *          a boolean
051   * @return the new item
052   */
053  @NonNull
054  static IBooleanItem valueOf(boolean value) {
055    return value ? TRUE : FALSE;
056  }
057
058  /**
059   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
060   *
061   * @param item
062   *          the item to cast
063   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
064   *         cast to this type
065   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
066   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
067   */
068  @NonNull
069  static IBooleanItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
070    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.BOOLEAN.cast(item);
071  }
072
073  /**
074   * Get the "wrapped" boolean value.
075   *
076   * @return the underlying boolean value
077   */
078  boolean toBoolean();
079
080  @Override
081  default IBooleanItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
082    return cast(item);
083  }
084
085  /**
086   * Get the boolean negation of this value.
087   *
088   * @return the negated boolean value
089   */
090  @NonNull
091  default IBooleanItem negate() {
092    return this.toBoolean() ? FALSE : TRUE;
093  }
094
095  @Override
096  default int compareTo(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
097    return compareTo(cast(item));
098  }
099
100  /**
101   * Compares this value with the argument.
102   *
103   * @param item
104   *          the item to compare with this value
105   * @return a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer if this value is less
106   *         than, equal to, or greater than the {@code item}.
107   */
108  default int compareTo(@NonNull IBooleanItem item) {
109    return Boolean.compare(toBoolean(), item.toBoolean());
110  }
111}
